## BufferBindingPoint enum

Enum specifying a buffer binding point.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum BufferBindingPoint 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  arrayBuffer | <code>34962</code> | Buffer containing vertex attributes, such as vertex coordinates, texture coordinate data, or vertex color data. |
|  copyReadBuffer | <code>36662</code> | Buffer for copying from one buffer object to another. |
|  copyWriteBuffer | <code>36663</code> | Buffer for copying from one buffer object to another. |
|  elementArrayBuffer | <code>34963</code> | Buffer used for element indices. |
|  pixelPackBuffer | <code>35051</code> | Buffer used for pixel transfer operations. |
|  pixelUnpackBuffer | <code>35052</code> | Buffer used for pixel transfer operations. |
|  transformFeedbackBuffer | <code>35982</code> | Buffer for transform feedback operations. |
|  uniformBuffer | <code>35345</code> | Buffer used for storing uniform blocks. |
